ygData.subject: End Game...
ygData.msgSnippet: Atma, injured as he was, swung his sword across Clash, sending mech fluid flying. Clash grabs the sword as he tries to bend it again and sets it on fire with a

Atma, injured as he was, swung his sword across Clash, sending mech fluid f=
lying. Clash grabs the sword as he tries to bend it again and sets it on fi=
re with a flamethrower blast, , melting the sword. Atma punches at Clash. C=
lash grabs his fist and simply plunges his hand into Atma's chest. Another =
one with their spark in their chest, it's too easy, is what Clash thought. =
Atma pushed against Clash, to maybe make him release his grip, he was rippi=
ng away at Clash's arms. Clash's new claws come around and lift Atma into t=
he air, while the tentacles on his back entangle Atma's arms up. Technosis =
was seen through the corner of Atm'as eye.

Atma: Run...

Clash ripped Atma=
's spark out and held it in his extractor. Atma was dropped and his spark a=
bsorbed through the extractor. Technosis, seeing this, was terrified and hu=
rt, but she dived underwater.

Clash: Where could that other one be? No mat=
ter, I don't need her cowardice.

Clash grew warts all over his organic par=
ts and grew spikes from his back around the tentacles. Clash flew off, sett=
ing the grass on fire and heading back to his mountain side to rest and hun=
t for more victims. Technosis peeked up from the water to get a breath of a=
ir and seen that Clash was gone and there was a fire. Technosis put it out =
by carrying water to it and looked at Atma's lifeless shell. Technosis touc=
hed him, but there was nothing to him anymore, his life pulled from his bod=
y. Technosis cried like a big grown up baby. She ran back to their old loca=
tion to see if Psuedo was okay. He wasn't, of course, and was just like Atm=
a. Technosis fell on top of Psuedo's body, creating a cross from above and =
doing actually what she did best, the same thing she did ever since coming =
to the planet, cry. She then pulled out a knife and was about to kill herse=
lf, but stopped, remembering what KitKat said about cutting herself. There =
was no place to go now, nothing left of her life. Except for KitKat, that w=
as the last place to go. But...she didn't even know where KitKat was. She k=
new what the Alliance base looked like. (The old one, that is) And the Maxi=
mal base, so she just had to find the other base and it would be okay.

Tec=
hnosis: Goodbye my love. I'm sorry I failed you.

Technosis took one last l=
ook and got the courage to move on in search of a base, like Psuedo and Atm=
a would have wanted. She realized she forgot about Weight, and she did have=
 his commlink frequency. She called him.

Technosis: Weight, your not going=
 to believe what happened to me, I lost everything, I mean...everything is.=
..absolutely fine over here, nothing is wrong at all, are you alive.

Weigh=
t: ..........You have the nerve to call me? You have the nerve to call ME? =
Where are you? Oh, nevermind me anymore you tropical freak of a dirty...

T=
he commlink got fuzzy. It came back on after 30 seconds.

Weight: And besid=
es that, your helpless, and I hope you die.

Technosis: I hope you get dige=
sted, have a nice time.

Weight: What? Wait, can we talk about....

Technos=
is disconnected from his frequency and blocked it. Now she had nobody to ta=
lk to, she had just lost everything she had in the world. Technosis looks a=
round. Clash was long gone. Her friends and loved ones were all gone now, b=
ut Psuedo wanted her to be brave, he wouldn't have wanted her crying like t=
his. Technosis goes searching for KitKat. Was KitKat still alive? She had s=
omehow lost KitKat's commlink frequency, and couldn't even remember if she =
ever had it in the first place. She just had to hope that none of Deemos' s=
oldiers were lurking around and that KitKat was still alive......
